Bachpan Manao launches BM in a Box, a city-wide movement to reclaim childhood
description: BM in a Box, which emerged from a collaboration between Bachpan Manao and Makkala Hubba, is a way of empowering communities across Bengaluru to create space for and celebrate childhood in their own neighbourhoods.

title: International Kite and Sweet Festival 2026 at Parade Grounds in Secunderabad
Black Box Names Sameer Batra as Chief Business Officer to accelerate International Markets Growth
Bishnoi gang strikes again in Canada: Jasvir Desi’s Brampton home sprayed with bullets
description: Gangster Lawrence Bishnoi's Canada-based chief, Goldy Dhillon, claimed responsibility for a shooting at businessman Jasvir Desi's Brampton home. Dhillon alleged Desi supported rival groups and warned of similar consequences for opponents. This follows previous gang-linked violence in Canada, including an attack on Kapil Sharma's café.

title: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz arrives in Bengaluru to visit Bosch campus and IISc nanoscience centre
Viswanathan Anand: On enjoying life, reading and Lit for Life 2026
description: The chess champion, who will be at The Hindu Lit for Life 2026, talks about how he unwinds these days

title: Mary Kom vs Onler Karong divorce : Onler alleges affairs; Mary claims property theft
description: Mary Kom's estranged husband, Karung Onkholer, denies her allegations of financial misappropriation and land loss, calling them baseless. He counters by accusing the boxer of extramarital affairs, claiming their marriage deteriorated over a decade ago. Kom, meanwhile, describes the separation as the "darkest phase" of her life, alleging she was cheated of crores and lost land.

title: JAC slam media debates on women’s clothing, demand action over online abuse of Anasuya Bharadwaj
How Rajasthan’s desert kitchens shaped Sarvato’s menu, inside Jaipur City Palace
description: We travel through Shekhawati’s desert village at the hottest time of the year, to document Rajasthan’s ingenious home kitchens, preservation techniques, and foraged produce to create a thoughtful tasting menu

From silos to systems: Teaching leadership for the multidisciplinary age
description: A 2024 report by HirePro, an AI-powered recruitment firm, reveals a perception gap in the industry readiness of graduates. While the institutions believe their students are day-one ready, the industry begs to differ.

description: Prosecution argues that Rahul Mamkootathil’s custodial interrogation is imperative for recovering evidence, including digital devices he used for his private and social communications with alleged victim from 2020

title: Will ask States to pay heavy compensation for dog-bite incidents: Supreme Court
description: The Bench said that even dog lovers and feeders will be held “responsible” and “accountable” for dog-bite incidents

25% tariff threat: Trump’s Iran move rattles Xi; will it upend US-China truce?
description: US President Trump has threatened a 25% tariff on any nation trading with Iran, potentially jeopardizing the US-China trade truce. This move, aimed at increasing pressure on Tehran amidst internal unrest, could significantly impact China, Iran's largest trading partner, and create complex challenges for India, Japan, South Korea, and Turkey.

title: Tamil Nadu, Sarvam AI ink MoU to set up India’s first ₹10,000-crore Sovereign AI Park
description: Sarvam AI is an Indian generative AI company focused on building full-stack AI platforms and foundational models tailored to India’s scale, languages, and diversity

title: Alert sounded in Jharkhand after 2 suspected cases of Nipah virus detected in Bengal
description: Nipah virus is a notifiable disease, with high mortality and potential for rapid spread, requiring immediate reporting to the Central government

What Zohran is changing in the NYC mayor mansion
description: New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani has moved into Gracie Mansion, vowing to maintain his grounded approach. Plans include installing bidets and adopting a cat, reflecting personal touches. Mamdani emphasizes opening the historic residence to all New Yorkers, aiming to bridge elite barriers and embody his people-centered ethos, even from this iconic estate.

title: Tamil Nadu gets new food secretary
description: Satyabrata Sahoo, secretary of the Cooperation, Food, and Consumer Protection Department, has been transferred and now posted as secretary, Youth Welfare and Sports Development. K.S Palanisami has now been posted as secretary of the Cooperation, Food, and Consumer Protection Department

title: Watch | Alyssa Healy explains why she decided to announce her retirement with T20 World Cup in June: ‘Timing’s right’
Gig workers row: No more 10-minute delivery deadline; Centre urges quick commerce players to drop time limit
description: Quick commerce platforms have agreed to remove '10-minute delivery' services after Union Minister Mansukh Mandaviya intervened, prioritizing the safety of delivery partners. Companies assured the government they would cease advertising strict delivery time limits, with Blinkit already removing the promise from its branding.

title: HPBOSE to roll out single syllabus for all govt schools, adopt uniform teaching schedule
‘Collaborations with Columbia University will further strengthen India’s capacity in AI, Robotics:’ Pradhan
'Dhurandhar' day 40 Vs 'The Raja Saab' day 5: The Prabhas starrer crashes after crossing Rs 100 cr
description: 'Dhurandhar' continues its phenomenal run, entering its sixth week and shattering records by becoming the highest-grossing Indian film, surpassing Rs 1200 crore worldwide. In contrast, Prabhas's 'The Raja Saab' experienced a significant decline after its opening weekend, with its Hindi belt collections faltering despite being a new release.

title: IPL spotlight to goodbye: 'Pressure, pain, sacrifice' — Ex-KKR spinner retires at 31
description: Leg-spinner KC Cariappa has announced his retirement from BCCI cricket at 31. After a memorable IPL debut for KKR where he dismissed AB de Villiers, Cariappa played 11 IPL matches. He also had a productive domestic career representing Mizoram, taking 75 first-class wickets.

description: Escalating unrest in Iran is disrupting India’s Basmati rice exports, causing order delays and a sharp drop in domestic prices. How much will Donald Trump's 25% tariffs now hit?

DHS shares another video of 'anti-ICE agitator' Renee Good minutes before she was killed — watch
description: A new video released by the Department of Homeland Security shows the moments before an ICE agent fatally shot Renee Good in Minneapolis. The incident, which has sparked protests and political debate, occurred when Good's vehicle partially blocked a residential street. The Trump administration defended the agent's actions, citing a threat, a narrative disputed by local officials.

title: Operation Gang Bust: Delhi Police arrest over 500 criminals in 48 hours in fresh drive
description: Delhi Police's 'Operation Gang Bust' has netted over 500 criminals in a 48-hour crackdown aimed at dismantling organized crime. The intensive operation targeted gangs involved in violent crimes, extortion, and arms offenses.  Recent arrests include three shooters linked to the Himanshu Bhau gang, apprehended for an attempted murder in Bawana, highlighting ongoing efforts to curb gang activity.

title: Haryana consumers may face another power tariff hike  — about 15-17% — as regulator reviewing proposals

T20 WC: A look at Bangladesh's explosive claims & ICC's rebuttal
description: Bangladesh's sports advisor claimed the nation would boycott the 2026 T20 World Cup in India, citing security concerns and an alleged ICC assessment. However, the ICC has firmly refuted these claims, stating their independent risk assessments found no specific threats and did not recommend squad changes or election postponements. Bangladesh's matches remain scheduled in India.

'We were ready for ground offensive': Army chief's blunt warning to Pak; flags 8 active terror camps
description: Army chief General Upendra Dwivedi declared Operation Sindoor, a counterterror action against Pakistan, as ongoing. He warned of resolute responses to future misadventures, highlighting the destruction of terror infrastructure and the successful neutralization of Pakistani retaliatory attacks. The operation underscored tri-service synergy and a national-level approach to future security challenges.

'Take them to your house': SC questions those feeding stray dogs; compensation warning for states
description: The Supreme Court warned states of heavy compensation for inaction on stray dog bites, particularly affecting children and the elderly. The bench also demanded accountability from dog feeders, suggesting they house the animals. The court emphasized its focus on Animal Birth Control rules and flagged non-compliance by civic bodies, leading to deaths from bites and accidents.

description: India has launched its logo and official website for the Brics Presidency 2026, with External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar outlining key priorities. The nation aims to foster global welfare through resilience, innovation, cooperation, and sustainability across Brics' political, economic, and cultural pillars. The logo, inspired by the lotus, symbolizes unity among member nations

$20m gold heist in Canada: One arrested, another suspect 'believed to be in India'
description: A man wanted in connection with the massive 2023 Pearson Airport gold heist was arrested upon arriving from Dubai. Arsalan Chaudhary faces multiple charges related to the theft of over $20 million in gold and cash. Police continue to hunt for other suspects, including one believed to be in India.

'Mujhe maar kar dikhao': Bajrang Dal member threatens to burn police station in UP
description: A Bajrang Dal member was caught on camera abusing and threatening to burn down a police station in Rampur after being denied permission to meet an arrested individual. The man, identified as Suraj Patel, later submitted a written apology and a video expressing regret for his actions. Police have filed an FIR and are investigating the incident.

title: ‘Lot of risks, zero benefits’: This high-rise painter earns ₹35,000 monthly, video sparks debate
What has Virat Kohli changed? R Ashwin decodes star batter's ODI dominance
description: Virat Kohli's masterful 93 guided India to a four-wicket victory, chasing 301 in the first ODI. His seventh consecutive fifty-plus score highlights remarkable consistency. Ravichandran Ashwin lauded Kohli's liberated approach, attributing it to enjoying the game. Shreyas Iyer also impressed on his comeback with a crucial 49, showcasing his ODI reliability.

Meta plans to cut around 10% of employees in Reality Labs division: Report
Digital arrest crackdown: Centre forms multi-agency panel as Supreme Court set to hear matter today
‘Paper tigers’: Sunil Gavaskar unloads on England and Bazball
description: Sunil Gavaskar has heavily criticised Ben Stokes' England following their 4-1 Ashes series defeat in Australia, labeling them "paper tigers." He argued that the Bazball approach has lost its effectiveness, with teams now able to counter England's aggressive style, especially on challenging pitches. Gavaskar also pointed to a lack of accountability in the English batting lineup.

title: Antonio Brown erupts online after DK Metcalf’s costly blunder vs Texans
description: In a low-stress first half, the Steelers held a narrow 7-6 lead over the Texans. Early drops by DK Metcalf, including one on a crucial drive, drew criticism, amplified by former Steeler Antonio Brown's social media commentary. Despite offensive struggles, Pittsburgh aimed to overcome early miscues in the second half.

title: Class 12 girl kidnapped, gang-raped inside moving car in Bikaner
description: Rajasthan Police have detained one suspect in Gujarat for the alleged abduction and gang-rape of an 18-year-old girl in Bikaner on January 6. The accused, who was known to the victim, lured her into a car with a promise of a ride to school. Police are still searching for a second suspect and the vehicle involved in the incident.

title: UP man clubs mother, wife to death, chews flesh from skulls; village watches in terror
description: A shocking incident unfolded in Kushinagar, Uttar Pradesh. A 30-year-old man clubbed his mother and wife to death on their rooftop. He then smashed their heads with bricks and consumed flesh from their skulls. The village watched in horror as the accused hurled body parts at onlookers. Police arrested the man, who had returned from Mumbai a month ago.

title: PSLV fails for 2nd time in 9 months; 3rd-stage glitch costs 16 satellites
description: India's first space mission of 2026, carrying 16 satellites including a crucial DRDO military satellite, failed due to a glitch in the PSLV's third stage. This marks the first consecutive failure for the PSLV, impacting strategic, diplomatic, and commercial projects, including a satellite refueling technology demonstrator.

title: Happy Lohri 2026: Top wishes to share with your loved ones
description: Lohri 2026, on January 13th, celebrates the end of winter with bonfires, songs, and traditional delicacies, honoring harvest and longer days. This vibrant festival in northern India, especially Punjab, signifies gratitude, hard work, and intergenerational togetherness, marking the Sun's Capricorn entry and ushering in prosperity.
